name: TopScrech
subtitle: Apps for every need, powered by Bisquit.Host!
description: From a passion to a purpose — making apps is what drives me forward. Designed in Amsterdam, compiled in Russia with love

apps.name: Device Specs
apps.subtitle: Device Specs explorer for the rest of us!
apps.localizedDescription: Know your device inside and out with Device Specs! Discover detailed information about your device’s hardware

privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This permission is required in order to test biometric authentication
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This permission is necessary to test GPS locating capabilities
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This permission is required in order to test camera functionality
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: This permission is necessary to test motion sensor capabilities
privacy.NSNearbyInteractionAllowOnceUsageDescrip: This permission is required in order to test UWB capabilities
privacy.NSNearbyInteractionUsageDescription: This permission is required in order to test UWB capabilities
